Turntail picks up a plasma rifle and heads out.

Turntail: DANG PIECE OF JUNK!

He shoots the fuel tank causing the shuttle to explode.  He sits down 
on a rock in a rage.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> He slams his fist on the console and the plan crashes towards 
Africa. 
> When it lands turntail takes a Rhino Beastmode.
> 
> 
> {Panthos - Africa, near Maximal City}
> 
> The black panther takes a moment to watch the small comet streak by 
over head, his ears picking up the distinctive noise of thrusters that 
makes this no ordinary shuttle, his eyes scan the decent watching 
where the craft might fall. With a look back towards the direction of 
Maximal City he yawns before changing course heading towards the 
likely crash point of the craft and shaking his head wondering if such 
a crazy pilot is worth the time...
